news.title: XIV ToDo localization
news.content: I had been asked a few times whether it was possible to have XIV ToDo in other languages, but I had not had the time to work on it... Until now! I'm happy to announce that I've finally set-up a localization system tied with Crowdin. If you are interested in helping out, please visit the Crowdin project and sign up! For more details or to get help, I created a #translation channel in the Discord server. Thank you for your support!

news.title: Happy year 2023!
news.content: A few days late, but happy year 2023 to all! XIV ToDo is now updated with 6.3 content. As always, let me know of any issues! Additionally, there seem to be some intermittent issues with signing in. If such issue happen, please try again 30-60 minutes later -- I am looking into it. Thank you everyone for supporting me and enjoying this tool!

news.title: Encounter & questline manual tracking
news.content: Another weekend, another long-awaited feature is here! Is the automatic encounter & questline tracker not working quite right? You can now mark those as cleared manually! Just click on the question mark icon besides the questline or encounter! (Bonus points: I've also added all of the Guildhests in the list of ARR encounters.)

news.title: Checklist customization
news.content: Hi all! It's been a (very) long time coming, but I've just published a few additional QoL features and tweaks for the checklists, including the long-awaited feature of being able to sort / move checklist items around! Try it out and let me know what you think! You can move checklist items by clicking the green 'Customize' button and drag-and-dropping items around.

news.title: Implementation of accounts system
news.content: Following a small break due to me going through Endwalker and a busy season at work, I have an important update: XIV ToDo now supports Discord sign-ins! This means that your data is stored on the cloud instead of your local device, allowing you to sign in from multiple devices at once. This required a lot of work behind the scenes, and has two big implications: it costs me more due to the additional infrastructure, and everyone has a 'fresh slate' and will need to re-add their characters and re-do their checklists. I apologize for the inconvenience. Lastly, I now have a Discord server in addition of the Twitter account. As always, thank you for your support and patience!

news.title: Release of Endwalker
news.content: With Endwalker's impending release, I've started to add placeholders for the various additions that the expansion brings. I am working hard to make sure that XIV ToDo gets updated with Endwalker content as soon as possible! In the meantime, I hope to see you all once the game is up and running again!

news.title: Rate-limiting update #2
news.content: After a week of work, I've just updated XIV ToDo to fix a handful of issues that were reported. You will notice that your characters will auto-update the first time the page is loaded after this update; this is normal. Additionally, I've scaled up my infrastructure to be able to accomodate for unexpected influx of users. Thank you for your support!

news.title: Rate-limiting update #1
news.content: Following yesterday's update, things have started to calm down a bit and the API seems to be returning slightly more consistent results. Adding characters should be a smoother experience now. That said, the API is still not 100% consistent and I am still working on stabilization before I move on to new features. Feel free to keep making full use of the Checklist page in the meantime, since that feature doesn't rely on Lodestone. Again, thank you for your patience!

news.title: Lodestone rate-limiting
news.content: Firstly, thank you all for your support and interest! After the traction this site has gotten from a Reddit thread, the API I use to get information from Lodestone is getting rate-limited by the amount of people trying out XIV ToDo at the same time. Unfortunately, this means that the Lodestone is returning errors and incomplete data-sets. As such, you may be unable to add a character or get a complete and accurate view of your progression until the load stabilizes. I am looking into mitigating this issue in the future, but in the meantime please try refreshing your characters again later. Thank you!
